text: avar tannalute kettukal turannuneakkiyappeal tannal keantupeaya carakkukal tannalkku tanne tiriccukittiyatayi kantu. appealavar parannu: "nannalute pitave, namukkiniyentuvenam? nam'mute carakkukalita namukku tanne tiriccukittiyirikkunnu. nannal peayi kutumbattin avasyamaya aharasadhanannal keantuvaram. nannalute saheadarane katturaksikkukayum ceyyam. oreattakattin cumakkavunnatra dhan'yam namukku kututal kittumallea. atrayum kututal alannukittukayennat valare vegam sadhikkunna karyamatre.â€
